[辦]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *breːns ): phonetic 辡 ( OC *prenʔ, *brenʔ ) + semantic 力 ( “ strength ” ) .

[辧]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 ): phonetic 辡 ( OC *prenʔ, *brenʔ ) + semantic 刀 ( “ knife ” ) .

[辨]
From 辧 , a phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *breːns, *brenʔ ): phonetic 辡 ( OC *prenʔ, *brenʔ ) + semantic 刀 ( “ knife ” ) . However, the phonetic component (the reduplication of the knife to mark prisoners) perhaps symbolizes two prisoners accusing each other, hence two different versions, which then leads to the concept of "discriminate".

[辯]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *brenʔ ): phonetic 辡 ( OC *prenʔ, *brenʔ ) + semantic 言 ( “ say ” ) . However, the phonetic component (which is the reduplication of the Kangxi radical of the knife to mark prisoners) perhaps symbolizes two prisoners accusing each other, hence "debating in an aggressive manner".

[辩]
Simplified from 辯 ( 訁 → 讠 )
